about_the_game:
The aftermath of a recently abandoned space station, once poised to propel humanity into a new era, a chilling tale of untapped potential unfurls. Its chambers, hold the enigma of a groundbreaking energy source that was meant to revolutionize our species.


Chart your own course through the abandoned station, navigating your way to its core. Alternatively, venture off the beaten path and uncover the hidden mysteries the station conceals


Collect energy chits to upgrade your suit and switch on-the-fly to annihilate your enemies


Leap, slide, or use your enemies as launchpads to reach new heights – fast-paced movement is your key to survival

Embark on an urgent mission to uncover the closely guarded secrets that led to its recent catastrophic downfall. Venture deep into the heart of the station, where you'll confront imminent challenges and unveil the hidden truths veiled in darkness.

Your mission is twofold: Deactivate the central defenses, and extend a lifeline to the survivors. The fate of this forsaken place and its inhabitants hangs in the balance. Will you bring redemption or plunge further into the abyss of its haunting recent past?

Embark on an urgent mission to uncover the closely guarded secrets that led to its recent catastrophic downfall. Venture deep into the heart of the station, where you'll confront imminent challenges and unveil the hidden truths veiled in darkness.

Your mission is twofold: Deactivate the central defenses, and extend a lifeline to the survivors. The fate of this forsaken place and its inhabitants hangs in the balance. Will you bring redemption or plunge further into the abyss of its haunting recent past?
name: Project Atno

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 | AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Forge your own path through a derelict station in this fast-paced epic adventure. Navigate the labyrinthine behemoth, form alliances with survivors, and uncover the secrets behind the mystery that befell this place.
